acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using ShineMind ("the App"), you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.

description.title: 2. Description of Service
description.content: ShineMind is a mental wellness application that provides guided meditation, gratitude journaling, goal tracking, affirmations, and sleep sounds to help users improve their mental health and personal development through structured daily routines.

userAccount.title: 3. User Account
userAccount.content: To use the App, you must create an account using Apple Sign-In or Google Sign-In. You are responsible for:

items.credentials: Maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials
items.activities: All activities that occur under your account
items.notification: Notifying us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account

premium.title: 4. Premium Subscription
premium.content: ShineMind offers a free version with limited features and premium subscription options:
premium.trialNote: Both monthly and annual subscriptions include a 7-day free trial. You will not be charged until the trial period ends. Subscriptions automatically renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can manage or cancel your subscription through your Apple ID account settings or Google Play Store settings, depending on your platform.

userContent.title: 5. User Content
userContent.content: You retain ownership of any content you create in the App, including:
userContent.license: By creating content in the App, you grant us a license to store and process this content solely for the purpose of providing the service to you.

items.unlawful: Use the App for any unlawful purpose
items.unauthorized: Attempt to gain unauthorized access to any portion of the App
items.interfere: Interfere with or disrupt the App's servers or networks
items.harass: Harass, abuse, or harm another person through the App

medical.title: 7. Medical Disclaimer
medical.content: ShineMind is a wellness tool and is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease or medical condition. The App is not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always seek the advice of your physician or other qualified health provider with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition.

ip.title: 8. Intellectual Property
ip.content: The App and its original content, features, and functionality are owned by ShineMind and are protected by international copyright, trademark, patent, trade secret, and other intellectual property laws.

liability.title: 9. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, ShineMind shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, or any loss of profits or revenues, whether incurred directly or indirectly, or any loss of data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses.

data.title: 10. Data and Privacy
data.content: Your use of the App is also governed by our Privacy Policy. Please review our Privacy Policy, which explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

termination.title: 11. Termination
termination.content: We may terminate or suspend your account and access to the App immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason, including if you breach these Terms of Service. Upon termination, your right to use the App will immediately cease.

changes.title: 12. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify or replace these Terms at any time. If a revision is material, we will provide at least 30 days' notice prior to any new terms taking effect. Your continued use of the App after such modifications constitutes acceptance of the updated Terms.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At ShineMind, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our mobile application.

information.title: 1. Information We Store
information.content: We store information you provide directly to us when using ShineMind:

items.account: Account Information: Name, email address (email can be hidden if you prefer), and usage data
items.subscription: Subscription Information: Purchase history and subscription status (managed through Apple)

use.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
use.content: We use the information we collect to:

items.provide: Provide, maintain, and improve the App's features and functionality
items.track: Track your progress, streaks, and activity history
items.notifications: Send you notifications about your routines (if enabled)
items.process: Process and manage your premium subscription
items.support: Provide customer support and respond to your inquiries
items.analyze: Analyze app usage to improve user experience
items.security: Ensure the security and integrity of our services

sharing.title: 3. Information Sharing and Disclosure
sharing.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information only in the following circumstances:

items.providers: Service Providers: We use trusted third-party service providers for data storage and subscription management. These providers are bound by confidentiality obligations.
items.apple: Apple & Google: Authentication is handled through Apple Sign-In or Google Sign-In, subject to their respective privacy policies
items.legal: Legal Requirements: When required by law, regulation, legal process, or governmental request
items.protection: Protection of Rights: To protect the rights, property, and safety of ShineMind, our users, or others
items.consent: With Your Consent: When you explicitly consent to sharing your information

security.title: 4. Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. This includes:

items.encryption: Encryption of data in transit and at rest
items.rls: Row-Level Security (RLS) policies in our database
items.auth: Secure authentication via Apple Sign-In or Google Sign-In

security.note: However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure. We cannot guarantee absolute security.

retention.title: 5. Data Retention
retention.content: We retain your personal information for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide you services. You may request deletion of your data at any time through the app settings or by contacting us. Upon deletion:

items.deleted: Your account and all associated data will be permanently deleted
items.removed: Your gratitude entries, affirmations, goals, and meditation history will be removed
items.retained: Some data may be retained for legal or regulatory compliance

rights.title: 6. Your Rights and Choices
rights.content: Depending on your location, you may have the following rights:

items.access: Access: Request access to your personal information
items.correction: Correction: Request correction of inaccurate data
items.deletion: Deletion: Request deletion of your account and data
items.portability: Data Portability: Request a copy of your data in a portable format
items.optout: Opt-Out: Disable notifications in app settings
items.withdraw: Withdraw Consent: Withdraw consent for data processing where applicable

rights.contact: To exercise these rights, please contact us.

children.title: 7. Children's Privacy
children.content: ShineMind is not intended for children under the age of 9. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 9. If you are a parent or guardian and believe your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us immediately, and we will take steps to delete such information.

transfers.title: 8. International Data Transfers
transfers.content: Your information may be transferred to and maintained on servers located outside of your state, province, country, or other governmental jurisdiction where data protection laws may differ. By using ShineMind, you consent to the transfer of your information to our facilities and service providers.

thirdParty.title: 9. Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content: ShineMind integrates with the following third-party services:

items.apple: Apple Services: Apple Sign-In, Push Notifications, In-App Purchases

thirdParty.note: These services have their own privacy policies. We encourage you to review them.

camera.title: 10. Camera and Photo Library
camera.content: ShineMind requests access to your camera and photo library to allow you to:

items.photos: Add photos to gratitude journal entries

camera.note: Photos are stored securely in your account and are not shared with third parties. You can revoke camera/photo access at any time in your device settings.

changes.title: 11. Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new Privacy Policy in the App and updating the "Last updated" date. Your continued use of ShineMind after such modifications constitutes your acknowledgment and acceptance of the updated policy.

contact.title: 12. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our privacy practices, please contact us at:
